actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Labor and Human Resources.

actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources requested executive comment from Education Department.

actions.in_committee: Committee on Labor and Human Resources
actions.text: Committee on Labor and Human Resources received executive comment from Education Department.

official_title: A bill to amend the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984 to make permanent the administrative offset debt collection provisions with respect to education loans.

summary.text: Amends the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984 to make permanent the authority of the Internal Revenue Service to offset tax refunds against defaulted Federal student loans.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Deficit Reduction Act of 1984 to make permanent the administrative offset debt collection provisions with respect to education loans.
